name: LD49 Unstable Tables: Tales Of A Super Hero Waiter
name_original: LD49 Unstable Tables: Tales Of A Super Hero Waiter
description:
LD49 Unstable Tables: Tales Of A Super Hero Waiter is an action game developed by sP0CkEr2. It was originally released in 2021.
You can play LD49 Unstable Tables: Tales Of A Super Hero Waiter on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
